verses.roman:
bhavabhūti, jayadeva, āra kālidāsa
tāṅ-sabāra kavitve āche doṣera prakāśa

synonyms: bhavabhūti—of the name Bhavabhūti; jayadeva—of the name Jayadeva; āra—and; kālidāsa—of the name Kālidāsa; tāṅ-sabāra—of all of them; kavitve—in the poetic power; āche—there is; doṣera—of faults; prakāśa—manifestation.
translation: "Even in the poetic compositions of such great poets as Bhavabhūti, Jayadeva and Kālidāsa there are many examples of faults.
